alert.note: Alert for Western Grant; Western Mineral; Western Pendleton (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 24 at 1:31PM EDT until March 25 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 6 PM EDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...In Maryland, Extreme Western Allegany County. In Virginia, Western Highland County. In West Virginia, Western Grant, Western Mineral and Western Pendleton Counties. * WHEN...Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds may persist Saturday night.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Western Grant; Western Mineral; Western Pendleton
